spec_data.Name: ghc-hxt-unicode
spec_data.Description:
Unicode encoding and decoding functions for utf8, iso-latin-* and somes other
encodings, used in the Haskell XML Toolbox. ISO Latin 1 - 16, utf8, utf16,
ASCII are supported. Decoding is done with lazy functions, errors may be
detected or ignored.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 15 Oct 2017 03:31:26 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Unicode en-/decoding functions for utf8, iso-latin-* and other encodings
